snippet.title: Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 | "Ultimate Puzzle Match" Trailer
snippet.description:
Japan’s beloved puzzle game series Puyo Puyo and the world-renowned Tetris® game franchise have teamed up again for the ultimate puzzle match in Puyo Puyo Tetris 2. 

puyo.sega.com/tetris2
